<url>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/lib/images/favicon.ico</url>     </image>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:about_groom&rev=1360840245&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2013-02-14T12:10:45+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:about_groom</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:about_groom&rev=1360840245&do=diff</link>         <description>[GOOS/ROOS considered in the MyOcean project (1) Global ocean, (2) Arctic Sea (Arctic ROOS), (3) Baltic Sea (BOOS), (4) Atlantic European North West Shelf Ocean (NOOS), (5) Atlantic Iberian Biscay Irish Ocean (IBI-ROOS), (6) Mediterranean Sea (MOON and Med-GOOS), (7) Black Sea (Black Sea-GOOS) ; European possible \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdgliderports\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd are indicated by yellow stars.]</description>     </item>     <item by  Pr. Laurent Mortier and Dr. Pierre Testor    Laboratoire d'Oc\ufffd\ufffdanographie et de Climatologie : Exp\ufffd\ufffdrimentations et Approches Num\ufffd\ufffdriques (LOCEAN-IPSL)  Institut Pierre Simon Laplace   Universit\ufffd\ufffd Pierre et Marie Curie, aile 45-55, 4\ufffd\ufffdme \ufffd\ufffdtage, case 100  4, Place Jussieu   75252 Paris cedex 05, France  Phone: +33 1 4427-7275   Fax: +33 1 4427-3805</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:datapolicies&rev=1360664725&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2013-02-12T11:25:25+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:datapolicies</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:datapolicies&rev=1360664725&do=diff</link>         <description>For the moment, this page provides raw material about these topics. Robin : Synergies FP7- SFs for Research Infrastructures]   *  [D. Periss\ufffd\ufffd, CPMR : HOW COULD THE MARITIME REGIONS OF EUROPE BEST SUPPORT THE IRI INFRASTRUCTURES ?]   *  [ESFRI Brest Declaration]\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item    <title>public:jobs</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:jobs&rev=1335961758&do=diff</link>         <description>Autonomous Vehicles Technician position available at the Scottish Association for Marine Science (Oban, Scotland)  We are looking for an enthusiastic technician to assist in the running of the SAMS gliders and AUV.   For more information see: <https://sams.ciphrro.com/Jobsearchresult.aspx> or contact Estelle Dumont <Estelle.Dumont@sams.ac.uk>   Application deadline: 23rd May 2014</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:outreach&rev=1386263315&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2013-12-05T18:08:35+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:outreach</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:outreach&rev=1386263315&do=diff</link>         <description>Please visit the website of - outreach program on Ocean Sciences   You may find answers to a series of questions, a number of resources (e.g.  on a typical glider mission, pictures and maps) and educational material including quizzes and games. With a quick click get information on e.g. , , or .</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:outreach_edu&rev=1395698992&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-03-24T23:09:52+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:outreach_edu</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:outreach_edu&rev=1395698992&do=diff</link>         <description>Please visit the website of the project   First of all, \ufffd\ufffd mon oc\ufffd\ufffdan & moi \ufffd\ufffd wishes to share certain aspects of the scientific research in oceanography and marine biology with the wider public and in priority with young children and students.  The project aims at an adapted dissemination of diverse themes concerning the oceans and wishes to arouse new interests and possibly new vocations. In addition, this initiative provides a certain number of resources including theme oriented files, quizzes a\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item Box 20537 1678, Nicosia Cyprus tel: +357 22 893987</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:partners&rev=1333116963&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-30T16:16:03+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:partners</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:partners&rev=1333116963&do=diff</link>         <description>*  Universit\ufffd\ufffd Pierre-et-Marie-Curie (UPMC, coordinator, FR),  *  University of Cyprus (UCY, CY),  *  Leibniz- Institut F\ufffd\ufffdr Meereswissenschaften an der Universitaet Kiel (IFM-GEOMAR, DE),  *  Helmholtz-Zentrum Geesthacht (HZG, DE),   *  the Alfred Wegener Institute for Polar and Marine Research (AWI, DE),  *  Universit\ufffd\ufffdt Trier (UT, DE),   *  the Finnish Meteorological Institute (FMI, FI),  *  Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (CNRS, FR),  *  Institut Fran\ufffd\ufffdais de Recherche pour l\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdExploi\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:policies&rev=1333315486&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-04-01T23:24:46+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:policies</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:policies&rev=1333315486&do=diff</link>         <description>For the moment, this page provides raw material about these topics. Some of the documents require authentication.    *  Presentations during the ESFRI Meeting in Brest :    *  [H. P\ufffd\ufffdro, RI/DGRI Director : Reasons for the EU to optimize / integrate its research infrastructures in marine sciences?]   *  [A. Robin : Synergies FP7- SFs for Research Infrastructures]   *  [D. Periss\ufffd\ufffd, CPMR : HOW COULD THE MARITIME REGIONS OF EUROPE BEST SUPPORT THE IRI INFRASTRUCTURES ?]   *  [ESFRI Brest Declaration]\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:research&rev=1425386805&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-03-03T13:46:45+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:research</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:research&rev=1425386805&do=diff</link>         <description>*   Gliderport description  *   Public deliverables  *   Publications</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:test&rev=1333358095&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-04-02T11:14:55+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:test</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:test&rev=1333358095&do=diff</link>         <description>The objective of GROOM is to design a new European Research Infrastructure that uses underwater gliders.   This new infrastructure shall be beneficial for a large number of marine activities and societal applications, relying on academic oceanographic research and/or operational oceanography systems.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp1&rev=1332952678&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-28T18:37:58+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:wp1</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp1&rev=1332952678&do=diff</link>         <description>The single task in WP1 is to coordinate the scientific and technological activities in GROOM in order to optimise the link between the different work packages and respective tasks. A dedicated WP for this activity will ensure that the connection, timing and summary from the scientific work that has been achieved in the other work packages is fully evaluated in respect to the design of a European infrastructure useful for GOOS as well as forefront science.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp2&rev=1333097159&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-30T10:45:59+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:wp2</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp2&rev=1333097159&do=diff</link>         <description>The tasks in WP2 will analyse the three preparatory actions (vision statement of the ESF Marine Board) in respect to creating and maintaining a sustainable glider component in GOOS. The synergy effects will be assessed with other observatories in GOOS, namely Argo profiling floats, Moorings, Ships, and Satellites. The financial as well as the legal aspects of a sustainable glider component in GOOS will be analysed. Moreover, the available legal framework to set up such a component in Europe will\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp3&rev=1333097233&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-30T10:47:13+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:wp3</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp3&rev=1333097233&do=diff</link>         <description>In WP3 we will explore the innovative part in operating gliders. This work package will ensure that the proposed glider infrastructure can provide a system that allows European researchers to stay at the forefront of research development. This innovative part shall reflect on European SMEs and increase their skills and innovation potential. One task is to analyse and promote the use of new sensors and sensor combinations (synergy) on gliders to observe, in near real time, the marine environment \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp4&rev=1333097420&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-30T10:50:20+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:wp4</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp4&rev=1333097420&do=diff</link>         <description>In WP4, existing glider missions data and metadata will be analysed in respect to an infrastructure relevant aspects, such as: scientific motivation (link to WP2 and WP3), data flow, sensors, mission design and software for piloting, as well as logistical aspects (link to WP5). The design and execution of new missions will be carried out to guarantee that a successful implementation of the various infrastructure parts designed in GROOM is possible. This WP will trial new techniques and approache\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp5&rev=1333097473&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-30T10:51:13+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:wp5</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wp5&rev=1333097473&do=diff</link>         <description>The existing but fragmented European glider infrastructure is analysed in WP5, and a future European infrastructure for gliders will be defined based on what exists. A focus will be given to 1) the currently existing, distributed ground-segment , 2) the glider scientific payload, 3) the tools to plan/dimension the glider effort to be made in order to fulfil the scientific objectives defined in WP2 and WP3 and 4) the costs of the individual Member State glider activity. All activities in WP5 will\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wps&rev=1335951824&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-05-02T11:43:44+01:00</dc:date>         <title>public:wps</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:wps&rev=1335951824&do=diff</link>         <description>The work in GROOM  is organized in six high-level work packages (WPs):   *  WP1: Project Scientific and Technical Coordination (UPMC): The single task in WP1 is to coordinate the scientific and technological activities in GROOM in order to optimise the link between the different work packages and respective tasks... [ More ]</description>     </item> </rdf:RDF>
